Title: Shutdown
Writer: Simon Blackwell (teleplay), Tony Roche (teleplay), Simon Blackwell (story), Armando Iannucci (story), Tony Roche (story), Armando Iannucci (creator)
Actors: Julia Louis-Dreyfus, Anna Chlumsky, Tony Hale, Reid Scott
Plot: With D.C. in the midst of a government shutdown, Selina is forced to furlough some of her staff. A damaging story leaks about Selina's ex-husband Andrew; Danny Chung takes advantage of the ...
